name: Portal's Redemption
description:
The game was created on 3 days.

The was created on Godot Engine 4.0

You play as Godot. You have to save the worlds which was created by Godot. Worlds Have been infected by strange collision of another worlds.

Controls:

WSAD -> move

Left Shift or Space -> dash

Left Mouse  Button -> shoot

In-game music used:

Guilt - Schematist

Lost World - Darren-Curtis
